camera_gear.model: Hasselblad X2D 100C / Phase One XF IQ4 150MP / Fujifilm GFX 100S
camera_gear.lens: Tilt-Shift Wide-Angle TS-E 45mm f/2.8 / PC-E Micro-NIKKOR 45mm f/2.8D ED

lighting_setup.time_of_day: Late morning (10:00-11:00 AM) or Early afternoon (2:00-3:00 PM)
lighting_setup.weather: Clear cloudless sky, high atmospheric visibility
lighting_setup.lighting_direction: Hard directional side-lighting from camera left (southwest or southeast), creating crisp shadows on building facade
lighting_setup.quality: Hard, high-contrast direct sunlight, sharp shadow definition, strong specular highlights on roofing

color_grading.palette: Desaturated industrial palette dominated by cool steel-blue sky, subtle autumn foliage tones
color_grading.saturation: Low to medium-low saturation (65-75%), muted chromatic intensity for industrial realism, greens slightly desaturated toward olive-gray
color_grading.contrast: Medium-high contrast with deepened shadows, elevated clarity for architectural edge definition, S-curve emphasizing structural lines

texture_quality.details: Ultra-sharp rendering of corrugated facade texture, precise vertical joint lines, glass reflectivity
texture_quality.surface_descriptions: Clear reflective glazing with blue sky mirror effect, asphalt road surface with lane markings

composition_guide.type: Eye-level two-point perspective, environmental wide shot, layered composition with foreground road, midground architecture, and background clear sky
composition_guide.balance: Asymmetrical balance, rule of thirds vertical composition

atmosphere.mood: Rational industrial precision, clean energy modernity, restrained elegance of post-industrial architecture, calm authority of civic infrastructure
atmosphere.feeling: Environmental consciousness, orderly industrial landscape integrated with nature, quiet monumentality

technical_quality.post_processing: Tilt-shift perspective correction for parallel vertical lines, clarity and structure enhancement on architectural edges, graduated filter darkening upper sky for tonal compression, HSL reduction of sky saturation toward cyan-gray, selective sharpening on signage and facade textures
technical_quality.white_balance: Daylight preset 5500K with slight blue shift (-5 warmth) to emphasize cool industrial aesthetic, preserving neutral lighting on facade
technical_quality.tone: Neutral to slightly cool tone curve with lifted blacks (+10) for detail in shadow foliage, compressed highlights on facade to prevent clipping, medium contrast S-curve
technical_quality.vignette: No vignette or extremely subtle (-5%) to maintain clean documentary aesthetic
technical_quality.dynamic_range: High dynamic range capture (14+ stops) preserving detail in bright facade surfaces and simultaneously in deep shadow areas of trees and building recesses
